mapper.select: SELECT permission FROM boot_sys_menu where del_flag = 0 and type = 1 GROUP BY permission

SELECT a.permission FROM boot_sys_menu as a ,boot_sys_role as b ,boot_sys_role_menu as c ,boot_sys_user_role as e WHERE a.id = c.menu_id AND c.role_id = b.id AND b.id = e.role_id AND e.user_id = #{userId} and a.del_flag = 0 and a.type = 1 GROUP BY a.permission

SELECT a.permission FROM boot_sys_menu a JOIN boot_sys_package_menu b on b.menu_id = a.id JOIN boot_sys_tenant c on c.package_id = b.package_id where a.del_flag = 0 and c.id = #{tenantId} and a.type = 1 GROUP BY a.permission
